UpdateSourceArgs: -c "cd vscode-server && echo 'Downloading Microsoft VS Code Server for Linux x64'; wget -qO vscode-server.tar.gz 'https://update.code.visualstudio.com/latest/server-linux-x64/stable' || { echo 'Download failed'; exit 1; }; tar -xzf vscode-server.tar.gz && rm -f vscode-server.tar.gz && find . -name 'code-server' -type f -executable -exec mv {} . \; && chmod +x code-server && echo 'Microsoft VS Code Server installed'"

-c "cd vscode-server && echo 'Downloading Microsoft VS Code Server for Linux ARM64'; wget -qO vscode-server.tar.gz 'https://update.code.visualstudio.com/latest/server-linux-arm64/stable' || { echo 'Download failed'; exit 1; }; tar -xzf vscode-server.tar.gz && rm -f vscode-server.tar.gz && find . -name 'code-server' -type f -executable -exec mv {} . \; && chmod +x code-server && echo 'Microsoft VS Code Server installed'"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'vscode-server'; Write-Output 'Downloading Microsoft VS Code Server for Windows'; try { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://update.code.visualstudio.com/latest/server-win32-x64/stable' -OutFile 'vscode-server.zip' -ErrorAction Stop; Expand-Archive -Path 'vscode-server.zip' -DestinationPath '.' -Force; Remove-Item 'vscode-server.zip' -Force; Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Name 'code-server.exe' | ForEach-Object { Copy-Item $_ 'code-server.exe' -Force; break }; Write-Output 'Microsoft VS Code Server installed' } catch { Write-Output 'Download/extract failed'; exit 1; }"
